chunk_prompt: Summarize this content about Topic: didn, help, permanent:
final_prompt: Summarize this content about Topic: didn, help, permanent:

sentences.text: the sort of thing one barely notices.
it was black with coal dust, so i rinsed it off.
i didn’t give it a good soap and water scrub until i got home several hours later.
it was going to be a few days.
make sure to clean any cuts well right away.
i waited too long and now my vision loss is permanent.
but i went early enough to still be alive.
the following morning she didn't know who i was or recognize her own house.
she lived for 16 more months but mentally was gone.

chunks.raw_summary: It was black with coal dust, so i didn’t give it a good soap and water scrub until i got home several hours later . The following morning she didn't know who i was or recognize her own house .
